chapters.title: Prologue: The First Sparks Fall
chapters.info: Shemerin, p. 15 (14)—Aes Sedai of the Yellow Ajah, the only Yellow among those who deposed Siuan Sanche and now advise Elaida. Slightly plump and fluttery, she never managed the outward calm displayed by most Aes Sedai. She was the one who told Nynaeve the Yellow Ajah signal.
